* Shadow Cat whirls around to face the laughing Aerotaur. She wasn't used to 
being caught by suprise, usually she can sence the emotions of others before 
they have reached her or Snow Tech. she unconciously rasied her arm to 
protect herself, sheil extending from it's energy form.*

" What the Inferno.... Who are you?"

* She keeps her shield raised and places her hand next to her lightning 
blaster for a quick retrival if he was an enemy. Mabey her internals where 
busted up, she needed to find out why she could not sence his arrival.*

*Snow Tech glances at the barrel of Prowls gun, a half smirk on his face. He 
turns his head to IR and speaks out of the side of his mouth so only she 
could hear*

" My, your tastes have changed since last we talked, now you go for 
over-protective and ugly? Jeeze, i thought i taught you better than that!"

* He looks back at Prowl, knowing that if he said anything wrong, this new 
bot would kill him, and probally blow of Ir's arm. And Snow Tech was too 
good of a friend to let that happen. He touched Iron Raptors shoulder and 
spoke gentley and firmly to him,*

" Iron and I are good friends, if you must know, and I was just jocking, you 
moron, if you hadn't noticed. And, if you do not lower that gun from my 
face, we will not get along. Plus, if you shoot me, you have a chance of 
hitting Iron. And then i don't think she will love you much then, now will 
she?"

* Snow Tech had taken his hand from Iron Raptors shoulder and placed it on 
his Ice-beam shooter, magnetically un snapping it from it's fastening and 
placing it into his hands, just in case this bot was a nut case and would 
shoot him. He also put his energy sheild on hold so in a nano, it would 
activate and save him and Iron from major damage.*

" So, just chill dude,"

* He placed his arm with his sheild on it in front of Iron Raptor, his first 
concern. Snow Tech did not know what new weapons Iron had now, but he wasn't 
taking any chances.*

" And put DOWN your weapon!"

* Snow Techs last request sounded with athourity, rarely heard through his 
juviniell lips, but when sounded, he made shure they new he ment buissness.*



* The little 'un was watching all this from the top of Prowls head. 
Confused, he watched the bot he had choosen to inspect aim a weapon at his 
friends who had saved him from harm a while back. His hackeles began to 
raise and his claws dug into the bots head. Before Snow tech could say no, 
he placed himself on top of Prowls eyes, effectivally blinding him, and 
began to attak with little sharp claws, prowls top lip.*

" Mew, Fhtttt!"
